entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 8:38 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:38 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 8:38 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
